1.title: Shiloh Loses his Teeth!
1.plot: This is what happens when you eat to much candy.

2.title: Another Girl with the Guy!
2.plot: All right here we go again.

3.title: Angry Shasha vs Shiloh
3.plot: Shasha gets angry when Shiloh bets she can't stay calm a whole day. Shiloh's going to have to run away from Shasha before she crushes him with her fists.

4.title: Ants are coming in!
4.plot: Get your food and sweets, the ants are coming.

5.title: Barbie Doll Makeover!
5.plot: Mimi wants to be the fairest of them all, so she builds robot toy barbie dolls to give Shasha a not so good makeover.

6.title: Big Friend vs Shiloh and Shasha!
6.plot: This is just too crazy, better watch out.

7.title: Boss Baby Happy Meal vs Shiloh and Shasha!
7.plot: Shiloh gets a happy meal including a brand new toy. Boss Baby. It's time to get rid of him fast.

8.title: Broken Fidget Spinner: Featuring Super Hero Kids
8.plot: Why did this have to break now.

9.title: Broken Laptop!
9.plot: Mom and Dad are not going to be happy.

12.title: Inside your Head: Official Music Video
12.plot: We hope you enjoy this music video we worked so hard on. Get down.

13.title: Boss Baby vs Bad Baby Shiloh!
13.plot: This Boss Baby thinks he's the boss of everyone, especially Shiloh. Shasha wants a baby brother, but all Shiloh wants to do is get rid of this little bossy baby.

14.title: Bunny vs Human Carrot: Rabbit Gets Shasha and Shiloh

15.title: Candy vs Shiloh!
15.plot: Watch Shiloh square off against candy, yes, candy.

16.title: Captain Underpants vs Shiloh and Shasha!
16.plot: Shasha and Shiloh are in trouble and the only person who can save them is captain underpants!

17.title: Onyx Family Winter Olympics Special: Curling!
17.plot: Shiloh and Shasha compete in the Olympics to become the champion of curling. Will they come home with the gold, or not?

18.title: Onyx Kids Winter Olympics Special: Hockey Edition
18.plot: It all comes down to this.

19.title: Onyx Family Winter Olympics Special: Figure Skating
19.plot: Shasha and Trixie compete in figure skating for the Winter Olympics.

1.title: 1000 Mph Fidget Spinner Crazy Experiment!
1.plot: A crazy scientist gives Shasha and Shiloh two fidget spinners and a big task.

2.title: 1000 Mph Fidget Spinner
2.plot: Shiloh and Shasha are playing with Fidget Spinners mocking how popular they are.

3.title: American Girl Doll vs Shiloh and Shasha!
3.plot: An American girl doll sneaks into the house and causes trouble for Shasha and Shiloh.

4.title: Barbie Doll Extreme Makeover!
4.plot: Mimi wants to be the fairest of them all, so she builds robot toy barbie dolls to give Shasha the ugliest makeover ever.

5.title: Bop it!
5.plot: Shasha is addicted to bop it so Shiloh tries to find a way to distract her.

6.title: Candy Video Game Prank!
6.plot: Shiloh and Shasha try the toy game challenge, Chupa Chups Lollipops.

7.title: Cobra Snake vs Shiloh and Shasha!
7.plot: Who knew a toy snake could turn into a cobra?

8.title: Crazy Candy Shop: Greedy Granny in Real Life Part 2
8.plot: Shiloh and Shasha are greeted kindly with a store full of candy, candy, and more candy.

9.title: Crazy mac and cheese lady!
9.plot: This girl must be a little crazy in the head...crazy for mac and cheese.

10.title: Creepy Hand vs Shiloh and Shasha

11.title: DIY Fluffy Slime with Shiloh and Shasha
11.plot: Shasha and Shiloh compete against Tom and Jerry on who can make the fluffiest slime.

12.title: DIY Slime Baff Toy Disaster with Clown!
12.plot: Shiloh loses his toy inside a slime bath and he accidentally falls in! Will Shasha save him in time before the shark eats him?

13.title: Fantastic Gymnastics vs Shiloh and Shasha
13.plot: Shasha is being mean to Fantastic Gymnastics...that is until she turns into Fantastic Gymnastics himself.

14.title: Five Nights at Freddy's Santa Claus Edition
14.plot: Uh oh! Looks like we're stuck for five nights at Santa's!

15.title: Funny Elephant vs Shiloh and Shasha
15.plot: A runaway circus elephant has come to Shiloh and Shasha to live with them, but that animal is such a hassle.

16.title: Gelli Baff Toy Game Challenge with Mashems, Fashems, Shopkins
16.plot: Shiloh and Shasha try a DIY Gelli Baff toy game challenge by combining Mashems, Fashems, Shopkins, and Avenger toys.

17.title: Gooey Louie Toy Challenge Game
17.plot: Shiloh has this strange fear that his brain might blow up if he sneezes.

18.title: Greedy Granny babysitting!
18.plot: A new babysitter is in town. Ah man. Someone hire Dixie and Trixie back.

19.title: Huge nerf game! Shasha and Shiloh epic nerf mega mastodon challenge
19.plot: Shiloh and Shasha challenge each other in an epic nerf game. Who will win?

20.title: Jojo Siwa Bow Mystery!
20.plot: All of Shasha's Jojo Siwa bows are missing? Shiloh and Shasha must investigate. Shasha needs to get her precious bows back.

21.title: Logan Paul vs Shasha and Shiloh!
21.plot: Prince Charming watched so much Logan Paul vlogs that he became Logan Paul.

22.title: Mouthguard Speak Out Game Shasha and Shiloh
22.plot: Oh, hello. Nothing really, just chasing Shasha in circles trying to get this mouthguard out. Hehe. Please help me.

23.title: Mr. Potato Head vs Shiloh and Shasha!
23.plot: Mr. and Mrs. Potato Head need to get out of the Onyx house before Shiloh and Shasha gobble them up. They wished they never trusted Shiloh and Shasha's 18-star hotel.

24.title: Reckless Shasha Crushes Hatchimal Toy!
24.plot: Shiloh is trying to hatch his Hatchimal but things go wrong when Shasha drives the car.

25.title: Roulette Candy Challenge with Extreme Sour Warheads Candy!
25.plot: Shiloh and Shasha played a Roulette Candy Challenge with extreme sour warheads candy, and bean boozled! Guess who won?

26.title: Secret Spies Shiloh and Shasha
26.plot: Secret spies Shiloh and Shasha are on a mission to find out what the two mysterious people are planning.

27.title: Shasha and Shiloh vs New Robot Toy!
27.plot: Shiloh and Shasha decide to get a new robot butler but they don't seem to realize what this robot is planning.

28.title: Shasha's Mannequin Princess Story
28.plot: Poor Cindy wants to go to the ball but her stepsisters won't let her. What will she do?

29.title: Shasha Turns into a Toy Moana doll!
29.plot: Shiloh hates it when Shasha annoys him. And it's even worse now that Shasha thinks she has superpowers like Moana.

30.title: Shiloh and Shasha get new twin babies!
30.plot: Sasha and Shiloh get new babies.

31.title: Shiloh and Shasha go to the gym!
31.plot: All Shiloh and Shasha want to do is a workout, but Tom and Jerry are being super annoying and bossy. How are they gonna get outta this gym?

32.title: Shiloh and Shasha turn into toys!
32.plot: Uh Oh. After Shiloh gets zapped by a mysterious toy machine, he turns into a Barbie doll?

33.title: Shiloh and Shasha turn into toys again!
33.plot: Shiloh and Shasha's nemesis has the perfect opportunity to zap Shiloh and Shasha into toys now!. But oh no.

34.title: Shiloh and Shasha vs best fiends!
34.plot: Shasha and Shiloh are addicted to best fiends but they forget to turn off the phone and all the characters jump out. What will they do?

35.title: Shiloh goes back to school again?
35.plot: Shasha's "sick", so Shiloh has to endure school all alone, also facing a mean guy! How is Shiloh going to get through school without being shoved into another locker again?

36.title: Shiloh's crazy glasses!
36.plot: Shiloh has found one of the weirdest glasses.

37.title: Surprise toy unboxing adventure!
37.plot: Shiloh and Shasha are babysat by Dixie and Trixie and they are very bored.

38.title: The Fly vs Shiloh and Shasha!
38.plot: Tons of flies invade Shiloh and Shasha's sleepover, so the call Tom and Jerry to the rescue.

39.title: The noise-o-meter vs Shasha and Shiloh
39.plot: We had so much fun playing The Noise-O-Meter app - thanks for sponsoring the video.

40.title: Shiloh and Shasha vs the Mystery Man
40.plot: Hmmm. Shiloh thinks there's something suspicious about this man named Sandy.

41.title: Bad Dream Official Music Video
41.plot: Onyx Kids Shasha and Shiloh make their debut in their third original music video "Bad Dream" with vocals from Shiloh and Shasha themselves and featuring vocals from Sinead and Shalom.

42.title: Crawling Hand Chases Shiloh and Shasha
42.plot: Oh no. There's a mysterious crawling hand on the loose and it's mad. What's gonna happen to the Shiloh and Shasha.

43.title: Crazy Clock!
43.plot: Shiloh needs to get rid of this clock Shasha gave him before it gets rid of him.

44.title: Gymnastics Challenge
44.plot: Trixie vs Shasha. Which one will win the ultimate gymnastics challenge?

45.title: I Don't Care Official Music Video
45.plot: Onyx Kids Shasha and Shiloh make their debut in their first original music video "I Don't Care" featuring vocals from Sinead and Onyx Dad and guest appearances from Shalom and Onyx Mom.

46.title: Epic Music Video Compilation! Part 1
46.plot: Some of our favorite music clips all put together in one video.

47.title: Funny Guest Visits!
47.plot: An unexpected guest visits Shiloh and Shasha's house.

48.title: Giant Candy Corn vs Shiloh and Shasha
48.plot: Who would ever know a candy corn could be this mad. Shiloh and Shasha need to get out of here.

49.title: Mystery Green Hand!
49.plot: A mysterious green hand is calling Shiloh and Shasha's phone.

50.title: Mystery Man Returns!
50.plot: Sandy the Mystery Man visit Shiloh and Shasha again but Shiloh still doesn't trust him.

51.title: Giant Spider vs Shiloh and Shasha
51.plot: If Tom and Jerry aren't working together anymore, how are they going to capture this spider?

52.title: Greedy Grandpa!
52.plot: Shiloh and Shasha's greedy barber grandpa come to visit and he is greedy for some hair.

53.title: Halloween Mummy vs Shiloh and Shasha
53.plot: Uh oh. There's a Mummy on the loose in the Onyx House. How will Shasha and Shiloh get rid of it?

54.title: Kangaroo vs Shiloh and Shasha
54.plot: A kangaroo has sped off from its Australian owner, so Shiloh and Shasha must help her get her pet animal back.

55.title: Our New Favorite Show!
55.plot: The whole point of the game is to be as quiet as possible. Can we do it?

56.title: Mystery Man vs Shiloh and Shasha
56.plot: Shiloh and Shasha try to match make a mysterious guy with Trixie!?

57.title: Nerdy Cousins vs Shiloh and Shasha
57.plot: Shiloh and Shasha's two extremely nerdy cousins come to visit; Holish and Ash Ash!? Oh no. We have got to go and hide in the closet before they find us.

58.title: Robin Hood vs Shiloh and Shasha
58.plot: Robin Hood and his sister Robin Girl must bring all the jewels back to the king...or should they?

59.title: Video Game War
59.plot: A video game has come to life. Now Shiloh and Shasha need to get it back inside the game before that scary creature lives with them forever.

60.title: Secret Spies Part 2
60.plot: Babysitter Zoe is actually a Super Secret Agent Spy who plans to take the info on all the hidden treasure from Agent S.

61.title: Shasha and Shiloh vs Green Friend
61.plot: A strange green creature comes to visit, but Shiloh and Shasha don't want him here.

62.title: Shasha's Hair Makeover Again!
62.plot: Shasha needs a major hair makeover, but her two hairdressers give her crazy hair that she doesn't like at all. Payback time.

63.title: Shasha's Tiny Hands!
63.plot: With her tiny hands, Shasha won't be able to compete against Shiloh in the ultimate sports competition. She has won first place for ten years straight. She needs to figure out how to revert her tiny hands back to normal, fast.

64.title: Shiloh & Shasha Trick or Treat Halloween
64.plot: Shiloh and Shasha need to get that person's candy, but the door keeps shutting on them. Where's a way to get in.

65.title: Shiloh and Shasha Back to School Teacher!
65.plot: Shiloh and Shasha are back to school with a new substitute teacher, but he's not a very nice (or smart) one!

66.title: Shiloh and Shasha's Epic Camping Trip!
66.plot: Shiloh and Shasha go on an epic camping trip with Dixie and Trixie.

67.title: Spy Kids Part 3!
67.plot: Agent S is on a mission to get his sister Shasha back.

68.title: Toy Puppet vs Shiloh and Shasha
68.plot: Tom the ventriloquist amazes the crowd with the famous puppet Robert...until Shasha insults him. Now Robert is going after Shasha until he can take revenge.

69.title: A Nightmare Onyx Street
69.plot: Shiloh and Shasha go pumpkin picking at a pumpkin patch and meet a mysterious girl. Little did they know how much trouble she would cause.

70.title: Broken Window with Greedy Granny!
70.plot: Shiloh and Shasha made a huge mistake. Now Greedy Granny is out to get them.

71.title: Crocodile Dentist vs Shiloh and Shasha
71.plot: Shiloh and Shasha have to run away a from a gigantic crocodile with smelly breath without getting caught.

72.title: Fidget Spinner Compilation
72.plot: Join Shasha and Shiloh on their awesome fidget spinner adventures.

73.title: Giant Fish!
73.plot: Shiloh and Shasha encounter a giant fish. Will Tom and Jerry save them? Will Jerry get a raise? Will Shasha grow a beard to go with her mustache?

74.title: Halloween Candy Challenge!
74.plot: Shiloh makes a bet with Shasha on who can stay away from candy the longest.

75.title: Shasha is Colorful!
75.plot: Shasha keeps on buying a lotion that makes her super colorful. What should Shiloh do?

76.title: Shasha is Freezing!
76.plot: Shasha drinks a nice, cold water, then freezes.

77.title: Shiloh and Shasha vs Giant Red Ball!
77.plot: Shiloh and Shasha never knew a ball could be this mad.

78.title: Shiloh Crazy Candy Chef!
78.plot: Why do I have to be the one to cook everyone food. I'm everything but a professional chef.

79.title: Shiloh vs Giant Eagle!
79.plot: An eagle is on the loose in the Onyx house!?

80.title: Straw Man vs Shiloh and Shasha!
80.plot: Straw Men will rule the world.

81.title: Toy Game Compilation with Greedy Granny and don't Wake up Daddy
81.plot: Watch Shiloh and Shasha in their adventures with games like Don't Wake Up Daddy and Greedy Granny.

82.title: Sprinkle Face
82.plot: Shasha can't wait to get her hands on these new sprinkles.

83.title: Shiloh and Shasha Easter Bunny with St Patrick Epic Rap!
83.plot: Shiloh and Shasha are divided when it comes to which holiday is better, St Patrick's Day or Easter, so an Epic Rap is the only solution.

84.title: Shiloh and Shasha go back to School!
84.plot: How are Shiloh and Shasha going to take teachers, lunches, and basiclly school? Not to mention math too!

85.title: Shiloh and Shasha Superstar: Drop that Beet!
85.plot: Shiloh needs to convince Shasha to pick up that beet and eat it, but she doesn't. There's only one thing to do now, an Epic Song Show Off.

86.title: This Christmas: Official Music Video
86.plot: Sing along if you know the words.

imdb.title: Onyx Kids
plot: Welcome to _Onyx Kids_ (qv). We are a family-friendly channel and love to play with toys, have cool adventures, and get into some funny situations.
